org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.view

Interface View<T extends Presenter>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the presenter
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CreateNewPackageView, EditPackageContentsView, HomepageView, OpenExistingPackageView, PackageGenerationView, PackageMetadataView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseViewImpl, CreateNewPackageViewImpl, EditPackageContentsViewImpl, HomepageViewImpl, OpenExistingPackageViewImpl, PackageGenerationViewImpl, PackageMetadataViewImpl

    public interface View<T extends Presenter>
    A View lays out widgets. The presenter bound to the view manipulates the widgets. The division of responsibility between the Presenter is flexible, but the View should be mostly passive.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Gets the about hyperlink that's displayed in the header.
